title: WrestleMania III
summary: WrestleMania III was the third annual WrestleMania professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event produced by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF, now WWE). The event was held on March 29, 1987, at the Pontiac Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan.[1] There were twelve matches, with the main event featuring WWF World Heavyweight Champion Hulk Hogan successfully defending his title against Andr√© the Giant.
